title: Mother-Daughter Procedures, And Other Cosmetic Surgery Trends
teaser: Renee Zellweger's new look provoked much conversation this past week. Data journalist Mona Chalabi of fivethirtyeight.com digs into who is having cosmetic procedures, why, and at what cost.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
